title: Thanks bobsongoats!
body: This is just an appreciation thread. The thing is that i had a rp issue and it happens that god sent me bobsongoats. I don't if she is a she, or he is a he, or she is a he, or he is a she. But I had such a nice time chatting with this person in the riot support chat (or is a robot o-o), we even had fun drawing (sorry for the scuffed pikachu). Don't change! Need a raise! xd.

replies.body:
Ayyyyyy this makes me all warm and fuzzy inside ^_^! I passed along this note to good ol' bobsongoats for ya!

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
